summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNED A 2014 RAM 1500. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING AT 65 MPH, THE VEHICLE HYDROPLANED AND CRASHED INTO A WALL. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE SEAT BELTS IN THE FRONT AND REAR OF THE VEHICLE FAILED TO RETRACT. A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED. THE AIR BAGS DID NOT DEPLOY. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE PASSENGER SUSTAINED MAJOR INJURIES TO HER BACK. THE CONTACT ALSO STATED THAT THE 2 CHILDREN SEATED IN THE REAR OF THE VEHICLE SUSTAINED EXTREME BRUISING ON THE TORSO. MEDICAL ATTENTION WAS REQUIRED. THE LOCAL DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE, THEY INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THE VIN WAS INCLUDED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V302000 (AIR BAGS), AND THEY WHERE MAILING OUT THE RECALL PAPERWORK. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 39,000. THE VEHICLE WAS DESTROYED. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE.
